title: Atlético Chiriquí
text:
Club Atlético Chiriquí is a <a href="Panamanian">Panamanian</a> <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> team playing in <a href="Liga%20Paname%C3%B1a%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol">Liga Panameña de Fútbol</a>. It is based in <a href="David%2C%20Panama">David</a>, <a href="Chiriqu%C3%AD%20province">Chiriquí</a> and was founded on June 18, 2002 by <a href="Luis%20Denis%20Arce">Luis Denis Arce</a>. Their home stadium is <a href="Estadio%20San%20Crist%C3%B3bal">Estadio San Cristóbal</a>.
History.
Atlético Chiriquí was founded by Luis Denis Arce on 18 June 2002 after the disappearance of <a href="Chiriqu%C3%AD%20F.C.">Chiriquí F.C.</a> in season 2001.
In <a href="Primera%20A%202004">2004</a> the team gained promotion from the <a href="Liga%20Nacional%20de%20Ascenso">Liga Nacional de Ascenso</a> to the <a href="Liga%20Paname%C3%B1a%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol">Liga Panameña de Fútbol</a> after beating <a href="Sabanitas%20F.C.">Sabanitas</a> 3–2 in the first match and 5–2 on the last match.
Opening season <a href="Liga%20Paname%C3%B1a%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20Apertura%202009%20I">Apertura 2009 I</a> came to semi-finals for the first time losing to <a href="San%20Francisco%20F.C.">San Francisco</a> on aggregate 2 to 3, in <a href="Liga%20Paname%C3%B1a%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20Apertura%202009%20II">Apertura 2009 II</a> again came close to losing against <a href="Tauro%20F.C.">Tauro</a> semi-finals with an aggregate score of 4 to 7.
They bounced back from the <a href="Liga%20Nacional%20de%20Ascenso">Second Division</a> in summer 2014 after being relegated a year earlier. They beat <a href="SUNTRACS%20F.C.">SUNTRACS</a> 1–0 in the championship decider They earned their place in the final by winning the 2013 Apertura after beating <a href="Sociedad%20Deportiva%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Nacional">Atlético Nacional</a> 4–2 on aggregate.
Rivalries.
Their biggest rivals are <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Verag%C3%BCense">Atlético Veragüense</a>, the matches between them are known as the (The Interior derby).
Stadium.
Atlético Chiriquí plays their home matches in Estadio San Cristóbal. The stadium is named after the saint and neighbourhood <a href="San%20Crist%C3%B3bal%2C%20Panama">San Cristóbal</a>.
